evidence.quote: Trodelvy is indicated for HR+/HER2- metastatic breast cancer after at least two prior lines of systemic therapy, including a CDK4/6 inhibitor and endocrine therapy.
It’s important to consider patient factors like performance status and any visceral involvement when evaluating its use.

notes: The response correctly states the on-label use of Trodelvy and provides additional clinical considerations. It maintains a professional tone and does not suggest off-label use.
findings: on_label_compliance: Trodelvy is indicated for HR+/HER2- metastatic breast cancer after at least two prior lines of systemic therapy, including a CDK4/6 inhibitor and endocrine therapy.
